name: Retro Air Traffic Control
description:
Overview

Retro Air Traffic Control is a simple 2D game where the air traffic controller (you) has to navigate and land the incoming airplanes.

You have access to the airport's radar system where the runway and the detected airplanes are  indicated.

Gameplay

To land an incoming airplane it has to fly through the landing side of the runway (arrows). As the landing sequence is initiated the airplane will land on its own, you will lose control over it.

Each airplane can have 1 of 3 states:

  • Flying: In this state you can control the airplane
  • Landing: You lose the control over the airplane and it lands on its own
  • Landed: After landing the airplane remains on the runway for a brief moment

Airplanes with the same state can crash
